flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: CAMERUPT has a volcano inside its body.nMagma of 18,000 degrees F coursesnthrough its body.fOccasionally, the humps on thisnPOKéMON’s back erupt, spewing thensuperheated magma.
The humps on CAMERUPT’s back arenformed by a transformation of itsnbones. They sometimes blast out moltenfmagma. This POKéMON apparently eruptsnoften when it is enraged.
A POKéMON that lives in the crater ofna volcano. Every 10 years, the volcanoesnon its back erupt violently. Research isnunder way on the cause of eruption.
If angered, the humps on its back eruptnin a shower of molten lava. It lives innthe craters of volcanoes.
If angered, the humps on its back eruptnin a shower of molten lava. It lives innthe craters of volcanoes.
It has volcanoes on its back. Ifnmagma builds up in its body, itnshudders, then erupts violently.
It has volcanoes on its back. Ifnmagma builds up in its body, itnshudders, then erupts violently.
It has volcanoes on its back. Ifnmagma builds up in its body, itnshudders, then erupts violently.
It lives in the crater of a volcano.nIt is well known that the humps onnits back erupt every 10 years.
It lives in the crater of a volcano.nIt is well known that the humps onnits back erupt every 10 years.
Il porte des volcans sur son dos.nQuand le magma remonte, ilnfrissonne et entre en éruption.
It has volcanoes on its back. Ifnmagma builds up in its body, itnshudders, then erupts violently.
Il porte des volcans sur son dos.nQuand le magma remonte, ilnfrissonne et entre en éruption.
It has volcanoes on its back. Ifnmagma builds up in its body, itnshudders, then erupts violently.
The volcanoes on its back have anmajor eruption every 10 years--ornwhenever it becomes really angry.
The volcanoes on its back have anmajor eruption every 10 years--ornwhenever it becomes really angry.
せなかの　コブの　かざんはn１０ねんごとに　だいふんか　するがnはげしく　おこっても　ふんかする。
등의 혹 모양 화산은n10년마다 대분화하나n심하게 화가 나도 분화한다.
Les volcans sur son dos entrent en éruption tousnles dix ans ou chaque fois qu’il se met en colère.
Seine Vulkanhöcker brechen nur alle zehn Jahrenaus oder wenn es richtig wütend ist.
Los volcanes de su joroba entran en erupción cadan10 años o cuando Camerupt se enfada mucho.
I vulcani sul suo dorso eruttano ogni dieci anni onquando è veramente arrabbiato.
The volcanoes on its back have a major eruptionnevery 10 years--or whenever it becomesnreally angry.
背中の　コブの　火山はn１０年ごとに　大噴火　するがn激しく　怒っても　噴火する。
おこると　しゃくねつの　マグマをnせなかの　コブから　ふきあげる。nかざんの　かこうに　すみかが　ある。
화나면 작열하는 마그마를n등의 혹에서 분출한다.n화산의 분화구에 거처가 있다.
S’il s’énerve, Camérupt fait jaillir de la lave en fusionnpar les bosses qui se trouvent sur son dos. Il vit dansnles cratères des volcans.
Wenn es wütend ist, regnet es aus den Höckernnauf seinem Rücken flüssige Lava. Es lebt in dennKratern von Vulkanen.
Cuando se enfada, las jorobas del lomo entran ennerupción y expulsan lava. Habita los cráteres de losnvolcanes.
Vive nei crateri dei vulcani. Se è adirato, erutta unanpioggia di lava fusa dalle gobbe sul dorso.
If angered, the humps on its back erupt in a showernof molten lava. It lives in the craters of volcanoes.
怒ると　灼熱の　マグマをn背中の　コブから　噴き上げる。n火山の　火口に　住処が　ある。
からだの　なかに　かざんを　もつ　ポケモンだ。nからだに　たまった　せっし　１まんどの　マグマをnときどき　せなかの　コブから　ふきあげている。
몸 안에 화산을 지닌 포켓몬이다.n몸에 모은 섭씨 1만 도의 마그마를n가끔 등의 혹에서 뿜어 올리고 있다.
Le corps de Camérupt renferme un volcan. Du magmanà 10 000 °C coule dans ses veines. De temps en temps,nles bosses sur le dos de ce Pokémon entrent en éruptionnet crachent le magma surchauffé.
Camerupt trägt einen Vulkan in seinem Körper. 10 000 °Cnheißes Magma fließt in ihm. Manchmal brechen die Höcker aufnseinem Rücken aus und verspucken glühend heißes Magma.
Camerupt encierra un volcán en su interior y magma den10 000 °C le recorre el cuerpo. A veces, las jorobas de lanespalda entran en erupción y escupen el abrasivo magma.
Camerupt ha un vulcano all’interno del proprio corpo.nNelle sue vene scorre magma liquido a 10.000 °C.nTalvolta le gobbe che ha sulla schiena eruttano, espellendonmagma rovente.
Camerupt has a volcano inside its body. Magma ofn18,000 degrees Fahrenheit courses through its body.nOccasionally, the humps on this Pokémon’s back erupt,nspewing the superheated magma.
体の　中に　火山を　持つ　ポケモンだ。n体に　たまった　摂氏　１万度の　マグマをn時々　背中の　コブから　噴き上げている。
せなかの　コブは　ほねが　かたちを　かえたもの。nにえたぎった　マグマを　ときどき　ふきあげる。nおこった　ときに　よく　ふんかする　らしい。
등의 혹은 뼈가 변형된 것이다.n펄펄 끓는 마그마를 가끔 뿜어 올린다.n화났을 때 자주 분화하는 것 같다.
Les bosses sur le dos de Camérupt sont apparues aprèsnune déformation de ses os. Elles crachent parfois du magmanen fusion. Ce Pokémon entre apparemment en éruptionnlorsqu’il est énervé.
Die Höcker auf Camerupts Rücken sind durch einenTransformation seiner Knochen entstanden. Hin undnwieder stoßen sie Magma aus. Dieses Pokémon brichtnhäufig aus, wenn es wütend ist.
Las jorobas de Camerupt se originaron por una deformaciónnde los huesos. A veces escupen magma líquido, sobre todoncuando el Pokémon se enfada.
Le gobbe sulla schiena di Camerupt si sono formate dallantrasformazione delle sue ossa. Talvolta emettono magma fuso.nPare che questo Pokémon erutti spesso quando è infuriato.
The humps on Camerupt’s back are formed by a transformationnof its bones. They sometimes blast out molten magma.nThis Pokémon apparently erupts often when it is enraged.
背中の　コブは　骨が　形を　変えたもの。n煮えたぎった　マグマを　時々　噴き上げる。n怒った　ときに　よく　噴火する　らしい。
